actions.command: execute at @s as @e[type=armor_stand,tag=lpm_Portality] if score @s UUID1 = @a[distance=..0.001,sort=nearest,limit=1] UUID1 if score @s UUID2 = @a[distance=..0.001,sort=nearest,limit=1] UUID2 if score @s UUID3 = @a[distance=..0.001,sort=nearest,limit=1] UUID3 if score @s UUID4 = @a[distance=..0.001,sort=nearest,limit=1] UUID4 run tp @a[distance=..0.001,sort=nearest,limit=1] @s

name: Charon's Boat
description: Upon receiving a fatal blow, prevent it and return to your active rift.
